channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Crypto.com releases proof of reserves, showing above 100% for BTC, ETH
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new disclosure page allows skeptical users to self-verify that their assets are included in the report.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Is Goldman Sachs the ultimate crypto contrarian?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Is the U.S. investment bank looking to buy up distressed crypto firms amid the bear market?

item.title: Investors chase Web3 as blockchain industry builds despite bear market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: Cointelegraph Research asked top venture capitalists and industry professionals, “What is Web3, and what does it mean for the industry?”

item.title: BTC price tests $17K on PPI as Bitcoin analysts eye CPI, FOMC catalysts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin begins to deal with fresh U.S. macro cues as BTC price steadily holds $17,000 support.

item.title: CZ and SBF duke it out on Twitter over failed FTX/Binance deal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The former FTX CEO claimed that Binance “threatened to walk at the last minute” without an additional $75 million, accusing CZ of lying about his role in the deal.

item.title: Amber Group ditches expansion plans after denying insolvency: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Temasek-backed Amber has raised about $50 million in funding from a new sovereign fund, with the deal to be announced in January.

item.title: SBF 'willing' to testify at House hearing on the FTX collapse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Despite missing a response deadline, Sam Bankman-Fried says he’s willing to testify at a U.S. House hearing into the collapse of FTX.

item.title: Bitcoin mining project in Kenya helps power rural community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Gridless Compute, a hydro-powered Bitcoin mining initiative, tweeted that the project has successfully powered a rural community and lowered its existing energy rates.

item.title: What is stagflation, and how could it impact the cryptocurrency markets?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alexandra Overgaag
item.description: What is stagflation, how to fight it with crypto and how are the cryptocurrency markets impacted by high inflation and economic downturn?

item.title: UK pushes crypto efforts forward through financial services reforms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The reforms include regulating stablecoins as a means of payment and creating a sandbox where firms and regulators can test new financial technologies.

item.title: NFTs could help solve diamond certification fraud
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Non-fungible tokens are being used to serve as digital GIA diamond certificates to ensure immutability, transparency and proof-of-ownership.

item.title: NFTs, Nonprofits and Longevity Intersect at Art Basel Miami
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Garri Zmudze
item.description: NFT artist Nikita Replyanski on the future of NFTs, his work with the Longevity Science Foundation, and art as community building.

item.title: Remote work triggers move to DAOs in the post-pandemic world: Survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: A survey from a sample of the general U.S. public suggests that millennials are more likely to join a DAO than any other age group.

item.title: Coinbase takes a shot at Tether, encourages users to switch to USDC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Coinbase’s request comes just a couple of months after Binance ceased support for USDC.

item.title: FTX reportedly gets 3 more months to stop all operations in Japan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Japanese authorities have postponed FTX Japan’s suspension deadline because the firm has so far failed to return assets from custody to creditors.

item.title: Turkey has an obsession with crypto — Specifically Dogecoin: Study
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A new study reveals Turkey is in second place for crypto-related searches worldwide and first place for Dogecoin-related searches.

item.title: Bitcoin price targets stretch to $19K as BTC jumps 4% from daily lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin retains $17,200 after an overnight squeeze takes BTC price action to within reach of one-month highs.

item.title: Kevin O’Leary lost the $15M he was paid to be FTX’s spokesperson
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Kevin O’Leary fessed up to making a massive mistake with FTX and is working to find out where his money went amid the bankruptcy.

item.title: 7 class action lawsuits have been filed against SBF so far, records show
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried has been the subject of many lawsuits and investigations since the collapse of FTX, with more likely to follow.

item.title: Approach with caution: US banking regulator’s crypto warning
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) said the digital asset industry was maturing but was “not yet robust” in its risk management.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried misses deadline to respond to testimony request, now what?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Senate banking committee set a deadline for Sam Bankman-Fried to respond to the request on Dec. 8 at 5:00 pm ET.

item.title: What's in and what's out for Ethereum’s Shanghai upgrade
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: A tentative timeline of March 2023 has been set for the Shanghai upgrade, which will enable staking withdrawals. A list of EIPs has also been packaged in, but EIP-4844 didn’t make the cut.

item.title: GameStop to drop crypto efforts as Q3 losses near $95M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The gaming company has minimized its exposure to cryptocurrency focuses but is seemingly still pushing ahead with plans related to NFT and blockchain technology.

item.title: FEC probe demanded after SBF 'admitted' making dark money donations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried previously told crypto vlogger Tiffany Fong that all his Republican donations "were dark."

item.title: What Paul Krugman gets wrong about crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By João Marco Braga da Cunha
item.description: Cryptocurrency has evolved over the last decade, but Krugman is still hung up on Bitcoin's 2008 white paper.

item.title: SEC calls on firms to disclose exposure to crypto bankruptcies and risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission's corporate finance division reminded companies of disclosure requirements and provided guidance to what else they want to know.

item.title: US lawmakers introduce bill aimed at reporting on crypto miners' potential environmental impact
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Crypto-Asset Environmental Transparency Act would instruct the Environmental Protection Agency to report on crypto mining activity consuming more than five megawatts.

item.title: DMI finds CBDCs not targeting cross-border payments, huge potential in metaverse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Digital Money Institute’s third annual payments report looks at central bank digital currencies for the first time, as well as other payment methods, through the lens of cross-border payment utility.

item.title: Ren protocol warns users to unwrap tokens or risk losses as upgrade looms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The team stated on Twitter that deposits would be disabled “shortly” and withdrawals within 30 days.

item.title: Countries and institutions move into crypto despite market drop: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: November saw a reduction in BTC mining revenue for publicly traded miners, a decline in venture capital investment, and signals of Bitcoin going to $12,000.
